trans-unit.target: 方法（字符串）–对于Nelder-Mead，可以为'nm'；对于鲍威尔，可以为'powell'。优化干扰参数的优化方法。默认值为'nm'

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Default is ‘IRLS’ for iteratively reweighted least squares. Otherwise gradient optimization is used.

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Either ‘parametric’ or ‘bootstrap’.
trans-unit.target: 方法（字符串）–“参数”或“引导程序”。

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Either ‘stuart_maxwell’ or ‘bhapkar’, leading to two different estimates of the covariance matrix for the estimated difference between the row margins and the column margins.
trans-unit.target: 方法（字符串）–“ stuart_maxwell”或“ bhapkar”，导致对行边距和列边距之间的估计差进行协方差矩阵的两个不同估计。

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Function to use for g-transformation, must be …
trans-unit.target: method（字符串）–用于g转换的函数，必须为…

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Method ‘fleiss’ returns Fleiss’ kappa which uses the sample margin to define the chance outcome. Method ‘randolph’ or ‘uniform’ (only first 4 letters are needed) returns Randolph’s (2005) multirater kappa which assumes a uniform distribution of the categories to define the chance outcome.
trans-unit.target: 方法（字符串）–方法“ fleiss”返回Fleiss的kappa，后者使用样本余量来定义机会结果。方法“ randolph”或“ uniform”（仅需要前4个字母）将返回Randolph（2005）的多评分者kappa，后者假定类别的均匀分布以定义机会结果。

trans-unit.source: method (string) – Not Implemented Yet Method to estimate the confidence_interval. “Default” : uses self.bse which is based on inverse Hessian for MLE “hjjh” : “jac” : “boot-bse” “boot_quant” “profile”

trans-unit.source: method (string, optional) – Method can be ‘unbiased’ or ‘mle’ and this determines denominator in estimate of autocorrelation function (ACF) at lag k. If ‘mle’, the denominator is n=X.shape[0], if ‘unbiased’ the denominator is n-k. The default is unbiased.
trans-unit.target: method（字符串，可选）–方法可以是“无偏”或“ mle”，它确定滞后k时自相关函数（ACF）估计中的分母。如果为“ mle”，则分母为n = X.shape [0]；如果为“无偏”，则分母为nk。默认为无偏。

trans-unit.source: missing ('none', 'drop', or 'raise') – Missing value handling for endog, default is row-wise deletion ‘drop’ If ‘none’, no nan checking is done. If ‘drop’, any observations with nans are dropped. If ‘raise’, an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: missing（'none' ，'drop' 或'raise'）–缺少endg的值处理，默认为按行删除'drop'如果为'none'，则不进行任何nan检查。如果为“ drop”，则任何与nans有关的观测值都会被丢弃。如果为“ raise”，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: mu_0 – The first guess on the transformed response variable.
trans-unit.target: mu_0 –转换后的响应变量的第一个猜测。

trans-unit.source: mu_array (1d array) – Hypothesized values for the mean. Must have same number of elements as columns in endog
trans-unit.target: mu_array（1d array）–均值的假想值。必须具有与Endog中的列相同数量的元素

trans-unit.source: mu_high (float) – Highest value of the mean to plot
trans-unit.target: mu_high（float）–绘制平均值的最大值

trans-unit.source: mu_low (float) – Lowest value of the mean to plot
trans-unit.target: mu_low（float）–绘制平均值的最小值

trans-unit.source: mu_step (float) – Increments to evaluate the mean
trans-unit.target: mu_step（float）–求平均值的增量

trans-unit.source: multitest_method (string) – This chooses the method for the multiple testing p-value correction, that is used as default in the results. It can be any method that is available in multipletesting. The default is Holm-Sidak ‘hs’.
trans-unit.target: multitest_method（string）–选择用于多重测试p值校正的方法，该方法在结果中用作默认值。它可以是 multipletesting 可用的任何方法。默认值为Holm-Sidak'hs'。

trans-unit.source: mvsk (list of mu, mc2, skew, kurt) – distribution is matched to these four moments
trans-unit.target: mvsk（mu ，mc2 ，skew ，kurt的列表）–分布与这四个时刻匹配

trans-unit.source: n – sample size to get the desired half length of the confidence interval
trans-unit.target: n –样本数量，以获得所需的置信区间的一半长度

trans-unit.source: n (None or int) – number of terms of quotient
trans-unit.target: n（None 或int）–商数

trans-unit.source: n (int) – length of array after zero-padding
trans-unit.target: n（int）–零填充后的数组长度

trans-unit.source: n (int) – number of terms of the impulse_response function to include in the objective function for the approximation
trans-unit.target: n（int）–包含在目标函数中的impulse_response函数的项数

trans-unit.source: n (int) – number of terms to calculate, including lag zero
trans-unit.target: n（int）–要计算的项数，包括零滞后

trans-unit.source: n (int, n >= 1) – Order of moment.
trans-unit.target: n（int ，n> = 1）–瞬间顺序。

trans-unit.source: n_bins (int) – number of bins or cells in the distribution
trans-unit.target: n_bins（int）–分布中的箱数或单元格数

trans-unit.source: n_bins (int) – number of bins or cells in the distribution.
trans-unit.target: n_bins（int）–分布中的箱数或单元格数。

trans-unit.source: n_burnin (int) – The number of burn-in cycles to skip.
trans-unit.target: n_burnin（int）–要跳过的老化周期数。

trans-unit.source: n_cat (None or int) – If None, then the data is converted to integer categories, 0,1,2,…,n_cat-1. Because of the relabeling only category levels with non-zero counts are included. If this is an integer, then the category levels in the data are already assumed to be in integers, 0,1,2,…,n_cat-1. In this case, the returned array may contain columns with zero count, if no subject has been categorized with this level.
trans-unit.target: n_cat（None 或int）–如果为None，则数据将转换为整数类别0,1,2，…，n_cat-1。由于进行了重新标记，因此仅包括具有非零计数的类别级别。如果这是整数，则已经假定数据中的类别级别为整数，0,1,2，…，n_cat-1。在这种情况下，如果没有主题按此级别分类，则返回的数组可能包含计数为零的列。

trans-unit.source: n_fact (int or float) – factor to determine the maximum number of iterations. The maximum number of iterations is the integer part of the number of columns in the correlation matrix times n_fact.
trans-unit.target: n_fact（int 或float）–确定最大迭代次数的因数。最大迭代次数是相关矩阵中列数乘以n_fact的整数部分。

trans-unit.source: n_factor (int) – The number of factors to extract
trans-unit.target: n_factor（int）–要提取的因子数

trans-unit.source: n_imputations (int) – The number of data sets to impute
trans-unit.target: n_imputations（int）–要插补的数据集数量

trans-unit.source: n_iter (int) – The number of updates to perform. Only the result of the final update will be available.
trans-unit.target: n_iter（int）–要执行的更新数。仅最终更新的结果可用。

trans-unit.source: n_jobs (int, optional) – The number of jobs to use for parallel estimation with joblib.Parallel. Default is -1, meaning n_cores - 1, with n_cores the number of available CPU cores. See the joblib documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: n_jobs（整数，可选）–用于与 joblib.Parallel 并行估计的作业数。默认值为-1，表示 n_cores - 1 ，其中 n_cores 是可用的CPU内核数。有关更多详细信息，请参见joblib文档。

trans-unit.source: n_last_obs (int or None, default: None) – If int, restrict plotted history to n_last_obs observations. If None, include the whole history in the plot.
trans-unit.target: n_last_obs（int 或None ，默认值：None）–如果为int，则将绘制的历史记录限制为n_last_obs个观测值。如果为None，则将整个历史记录包括在图中。

trans-unit.source: n_rep (integer) – The number of simulation replications.
trans-unit.target: n_rep（整数）–模拟复制的数量。

trans-unit.source: n_res (int, optional) – The number of random re-samples used to estimate the bandwidth. Only has an effect if randomize == True. Default value is 25.
trans-unit.target: n_res（int ，optional）–用于估计带宽的随机重采样数。仅在 randomize == True 。预设值为25。

trans-unit.source: n_skip (int) – The number of imputed datasets to skip between consecutive imputed datasets that are used for analysis.
trans-unit.target: n_skip（int）–在用于分析的连续估算数据集之间跳过的估算数据集的数量。

trans-unit.source: n_sub (int, optional) – Size of the sub-samples. Default is 50.
trans-unit.target: n_sub（int ，optional）–子样本的大小。默认值为50。

trans-unit.source: n_totobs (float) – The number of total observations in endog. Sometimes n in the docs.
trans-unit.target: n_totobs（float）–在 endog 中的总观察次数。有时在文档中为 n 。

trans-unit.source: n_totobs (float) – The total number of observations for endog. This includes all observations, even pre-sample values if the model is fit using css.
trans-unit.target: n_totobs（float）–对 endog 的观察总数。如果模型使用 css 拟合，则包括所有观察值，甚至包括样本前值。

trans-unit.source: nrejs (list of pairs) – list of pair-indices with smaller than critical difference
trans-unit.target: nrejs（对列表）–小于临界差的对索引列表

trans-unit.source: nrep (int) – number of bootstrap replications
trans-unit.target: nrep（int）–引导复制数

trans-unit.source: nrows (int) – The expected number of rows (elements of the vector).
trans-unit.target: nrows（int）–预期的行数（向量的元素）。

trans-unit.source: nrows (int) – The expected number of rows.
trans-unit.target: nrows（int）–预期的行数。

trans-unit.source: nsample (int) – length of simulated time series
trans-unit.target: nsample（int）–模拟时间序列的长度

trans-unit.source: nsample (int or tuple of ints) – If nsample is an integer, then this creates a 1d timeseries of length size. If nsample is a tuple, creates a len(nsample) dimensional time series where time is indexed along the input variable axis. All series are unless distrvs generates dependent data.
trans-unit.target: nsample（int 或int的元组）–如果nsample是整数，则将创建一个1d时间长度长度序列。如果nsample是一个元组，则创建一个len（nsample）维时间序列，其中时间沿输入变量 axis 索引。除非 distrvs 生成相关数据，否则所有序列都是如此。

trans-unit.source: nsides (int, optional) – If 2, a centered moving average is computed using the filter coefficients. If 1, the filter coefficients are for past values only. Both methods use scipy.signal.convolve.
trans-unit.target: nsides（int ，optional）–如果为2，则使用滤波器系数计算中心移动平均值。如果为1，则滤波器系数仅用于过去的值。两种方法都使用scipy.signal.convolve。

trans-unit.source: nsimulations (int) – The number of observations to simulate. If the model is time-invariant this can be any number. If the model is time-varying, then this number must be less than or equal to the number
trans-unit.target: nsimulations（int）–要模拟的观测值的数量。如果模型是时不变的，则可以是任何数字。如果模型是随时间变化的，则此数字必须小于或等于该数字

trans-unit.source: nstatic (int) – Number of in-sample static predictions (these are always the first elements of the prediction output).
trans-unit.target: nstatic（int）–样本内静态预测的数量（这些始终是预测输出的前几个元素）。

trans-unit.source: nsupp (integer) – number of bins. The algorithm tries to find bins with equal weights. depending on the distribution, the actual number of bins can be smaller.
trans-unit.target: nsupp（整数）–箱数。该算法尝试找到权重相等的垃圾箱。取决于分布，箱的实际数量可以更少。

trans-unit.source: null (float) – The null value of the log odds ratio.
trans-unit.target: null（float）–对数优势比的空值。

trans-unit.source: null (float) – The null value of the log risk ratio.
trans-unit.target: null（float）–对数风险比的空值。

trans-unit.source: null (float) – The null value of the odds ratio.
trans-unit.target: null（浮动）–比值比的空值。

trans-unit.source: null (float) – The null value of the risk ratio.
trans-unit.target: null（float）–风险比率的空值。

trans-unit.source: null_deviance (float) – The value of the deviance function for the model fit with a constant as the only regressor.
trans-unit.target: null_deviance（float）–模型的偏差函数的值以一个常数作为唯一回归变量。

trans-unit.source: null_lb (float) – Z-scores between null_lb and null_ub are all considered to be true null hypotheses.
trans-unit.target: null_lb（float）– null_lb 和 null_ub 之间的Z分数视为真实的null假设。

trans-unit.source: null_mean (float) – The expected value of the test statistic under the null hypothesis.
trans-unit.target: null_mean（浮动）–在原假设下测试统计量的期望值。

trans-unit.source: null_pdf (function mapping reals to positive reals) – The density of null Z-scores; if None, use standard normal
trans-unit.target: null_pdf（函数将实数映射为正数）–空Z分数的密度；如果没有，则使用标准普通

trans-unit.source: null_proportion (float) – The assumed proportion of true null hypotheses
trans-unit.target: null_proportion（浮点数）–真实零假设的假定比例

trans-unit.source: null_sd (float) – The standard deviation of the test statistic under the null hypothesis.
trans-unit.target: null_sd（float）–在零假设下的检验统计量的标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: null_ub (float) – See null_lb.
trans-unit.target: null_ub（float）–参见 null_lb 。

trans-unit.source: num (array_like) – signal or lag polynomial
trans-unit.target: num（array_like）–信号或滞后多项式

trans-unit.source: num_high (integer) – The number of points at which to calculate the likelihood abov the MLE of the parameter of interest.
trans-unit.target: num_high（integer）–计算感兴趣参数的MLE之后的似然性的点数。

trans-unit.source: num_low (integer) – The number of points at which to calculate the likelihood below the MLE of the parameter of interest.
trans-unit.target: num_low（integer）–计算感兴趣参数的MLE以下似然性的点数。

trans-unit.source: num_steps (int) – The number of dep_params in the sequence
trans-unit.target: num_steps（int）–序列中的dep_params数

trans-unit.source: o (Iterable) – Observed values
trans-unit.target: o（可迭代）–观测值

trans-unit.source: obj – Each ic is an attribute with a DataFrame for the results. The AR order used is the row index. The ma order used is the column index. The minimum orders are available as ic_min_order.
trans-unit.target: obj –每个ic是带有结果的DataFrame的属性。使用的AR顺序是行索引。使用的主要顺序是列索引。最小订单数为 ic_min_order 。

trans-unit.source: obs_cov (array_like, optional) – The covariance matrix for the observation equation \(H\). Default is set to zeros.
trans-unit.target: obs_cov（array_like ，可选）–观测方程\（H \）的协方差矩阵。默认设置为零。

trans-unit.source: obs_hist_args (dict) – Keyword arguments to be passed to pyplot.hist when creating the histogram for observed values.
trans-unit.target: obs_hist_args（dict）–为观察值创建直方图时要传递给pyplot.hist的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: obs_intercept (array_like, optional) – The intercept for the observation equation, \(d\). Default is set to zeros.
trans-unit.target: obs_intercept（array_like ，可选）–观测方程\（d \）的截距。默认设置为零。

trans-unit.source: obs_labels (bool or array-like) – Whether or not to annotate the plot points with their observation labels. If obs_labels is a boolean, the point labels will try to do the right thing. First it will try to use the index of data, then fall back to the index of exog_i. Alternatively, you may give an array-like object corresponding to the obseveration numbers.
trans-unit.target: obs_labels（布尔型或类似数组的）–是否用观察标记对绘图点进行注释。如果obs_labels是布尔值，则点标签将尝试做正确的事情。首先它将尝试使用数据索引，然后回退到exog_i的索引。或者，您可以给与观察号对应的类似数组的对象。

trans-unit.source: observed (bool) – If True, then the observed Hessian is returned (default). If false then the expected information matrix is returned.
trans-unit.target: Observed（bool）–如果为True，则返回观察到的Hessian（默认）。如果为false，则返回预期的信息矩阵。

trans-unit.source: observed (bool) – If True, then the observed Hessian is returned. If false then the expected information matrix is returned.
trans-unit.target: 观察到的（布尔）–如果为True，则返回观察到的黑森州。如果为false，则返回期望的信息矩阵。

trans-unit.source: observed (bool) – If True, then the observed Hessian is used in calculating the covariance matrix of the score. If false then the expected information matrix is used.
trans-unit.target: 观测值（bool）–如果为True，则将观测到的Hessian用于计算分数的协方差矩阵。如果为假，则使用期望的信息矩阵。

trans-unit.source: offset (None or ndarray (steps, neqs)) – If not None, then offset is added as an observation specific intercept to the autoregression. If it is None and either trend (including intercept) or exog were used in the VAR model, then the linear predictor of those components will be used as offset. This should have the same number of rows as steps, and the same number of columns as endogenous variables (neqs).
trans-unit.target: offset（None 或ndarray （steps ，neqs ））–如果不是None，则将offset作为观察特定的拦截添加到自回归中。如果它为“无”，并且在VAR模型中使用了趋势（包括截距）或exog，则这些分量的线性预测变量将用作偏移量。它的行数应与步骤相同，列数应与内生变量（neqs）相同。

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like) – An offset to be included in the fit. If provided, must be an array whose length is the number of rows in exog.
trans-unit.target: offset（类似数组的元素）–要包含在拟合中的偏移量。如果提供，则必须是一个数组，其长度是exog中的行数。

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like) – Array of offset values
trans-unit.target: offset（类似数组）–偏移值数组

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like) – Offset values used to create the predicted values.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量（类似于数组）–用于创建预测值的偏移量值。

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like or None) – An offset to be included in the model. If provided, must be an array whose length is the number of rows in exog.
trans-unit.target: offset（类似数组或None）–要包含在模型中的偏移量。如果提供，则必须是一个数组，其长度是exog中的行数。

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like, optional) – Offset for exog if provided. If offset is None, model offset is used.
trans-unit.target: offset（array-like ，optional）– exog的偏移（如果提供）。如果offset为None，则使用模型偏移。

trans-unit.source: offset (array-like, optional) – Offset values. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: offset（类似数组的数组，可选）–偏移值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: offset (array, optional) – Offset is added to the linear prediction with coefficient equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: offset（数组，可选）–将偏移添加到系数等于1的线性预测中。

trans-unit.source: offset (array_like) – Offset is added to the linear prediction with coefficient equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: offset（array_like）–将偏移量添加到系数等于1的线性预测中。

trans-unit.source: offset (array_like, optional) – Offset is added to the linear prediction with coefficient equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: offset（array_like ，optional）–将偏移量添加到系数等于1的线性预测中。

trans-unit.source: offset_exposure (array-like, optional) – Combined offset and exposure.
trans-unit.target: offset_exposure（类似数组，可选）–组合的偏移量和曝光量。

trans-unit.source: olsresiduals (ndarray) – array of residuals from an OLS estimation
trans-unit.target: olsresiduals（ndarray）– OLS估计中的残差数组

trans-unit.source: olsresults (instance of RegressionResults) – uses only endog and exog
trans-unit.target: olsresults（RegressionResults的实例）–仅使用endog和exog

trans-unit.source: only_options (boolean, optional) – If set to true, only the filter options are updated, and the state space representation is not updated. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: only_options（boolean ，optional）–如果设置为true，则仅更新过滤器选项，并且不更新状态空间表示形式。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: only_options (boolean, optional) – If set to true, only the smoother and filter options are updated, and the state space representation is not updated. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: only_options（boolean ，optional）–如果设置为true，则仅更新更平滑和过滤器选项，并且不更新状态空间表示形式。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: opg, oim, approx, robust, robust_approx
trans-unit.target: opg，oim，约，鲁棒，robust_approx

trans-unit.source: opt (dict-like) – Keyword arguments passed to optimizer, only used for ML estimation
trans-unit.target: opt（类似dict的）–传递给优化器的关键字参数，仅用于ML估计

trans-unit.source: opt_method (string) – Optimization method for ML estimation
trans-unit.target: opt_method（字符串）– ML估计的优化方法

trans-unit.source: optim_args (dict) – keyword arguments for the numerical optimizer.
trans-unit.target: optim_args（dict）–数值优化器的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: optim_complex_step (bool, optional) – Whether or not to use complex step differentiation when approximating the score; if False, finite difference approximation is used. Default is True. This keyword is only relevant if optim_score is set to ‘harvey’ or ‘approx’.
trans-unit.target: optim_complex_step（bool ，可选）–逼近分数时是否使用复杂的步阶微分；如果为False，则使用有限差分近似。默认值为True。仅当 optim_score 设置为“ harvey”或“ approx”时，此关键字才有意义。

trans-unit.source: optim_hessian ({'eim', 'oim'}, optional) – When ‘oim’, the default, the observed Hessian is used in fitting. ‘eim’ is the expected Hessian. This may provide more stable fits, but adds assumption that the Hessian is correctly specified.
trans-unit.target: optim_hessian（{'eim' ，'oim'} ，可选）–当'oim'为默认值时，将使用观察到的Hessian进行拟合。“ eim”是预期的黑森州。这可能会提供更稳定的拟合，但是增加了正确指定粗麻布的假设。

trans-unit.source: optim_hessian ({'opg','oim','approx'}, optional) – The method by which the Hessian is numerically approximated. ‘opg’ uses outer product of gradients, ‘oim’ uses the information matrix formula from Harvey (1989), and ‘approx’ uses numerical approximation. This keyword is only relevant if the optimization method uses the Hessian matrix.
trans-unit.target: optim_hessian（{' opg ' ，'oim' ，'approx'} ，可选）–以数字方式近似Hessian的方法。“ opg”使用梯度的外积，“ oim”使用Harvey（1989）的信息矩阵公式，“ approx”使用数值近似。仅当优化方法使用Hessian矩阵时，此关键字才相关。

trans-unit.source: optim_method (not used,) – optimization method, not used, only for consistency of method signature
trans-unit.target: optim_method（not used ，）–优化方法，未使用，仅用于方法签名的一致性

trans-unit.source: optim_method (string, default is 'bfgs') – numerical optimization method. Currently not all optimizers that are available in LikelihoodModels are connected.
trans-unit.target: optim_method（字符串，默认为'bfgs'）–数值优化方法。当前，并非所有LikelihoodModels中可用的优化器都已连接。

trans-unit.source: optim_score ({'harvey', 'approx'} or None, optional) – The method by which the score vector is calculated. ‘harvey’ uses the method from Harvey (1989), ‘approx’ uses either finite difference or complex step differentiation depending upon the value of optim_complex_step, and None uses the built-in gradient approximation of the optimizer. Default is None. This keyword is only relevant if the optimization method uses the score.
trans-unit.target: optim_score（{'harvey' ，'approx'} 或None ，可选）–计算得分向量的方法。“ harvey”使用Harvey（1989）的方法，“ approx”根据 optim_complex_step 的值使用有限差分或复数阶跃微分，而None使用优化器的内置梯度近似。默认为无。仅当优化方法使用分数时，此关键字才相关。

trans-unit.source: optimized (bool) – Should the values that have not been set above be optimized automatically?
trans-unit.target: 最优化（bool）–是否应自动优化上面未设置的值？

trans-unit.source: optimized (bool, optional) – Should the values that have not been set above be optimized automatically?
trans-unit.target: 优化（bool ，可选）–是否应自动优化上面未设置的值？

trans-unit.source: order. (same) –
trans-unit.target: 订购。（相同）–

trans-unit.source: order (array-like) – 3 item iterable, with the number of AR, MA, and exogenous parameters, including the trend
trans-unit.target: 订单（类似数组）– 3项可迭代，带有AR，MA和外部参数的数量，包括趋势

trans-unit.source: order (bool) – Whether or not to order the results by the absolute value of the studentized residuals. If labels are provided they will also be sorted.
trans-unit.target: order（bool）–是否按学生化残差的绝对值对结果进行排序。如果提供了标签，它们也会被排序。

trans-unit.source: order (float or 'med', 'min', 'max') – which order statistic to calculate
trans-unit.target: 顺序（float 或“ med” ，“ min” ，“ max”）–要计算的顺序统计信息

trans-unit.source: order (int) – specifies the polynomial order of the trend, zero is constant, one is linear trend, two is quadratic trend
trans-unit.target: order（int）–指定趋势的多项式顺序，零为常数，一为线性趋势，二为二次趋势

trans-unit.source: order (integer) – The order of the autoregressive lag polynomial.
trans-unit.target: order（整数）–自回归滞后多项式的阶数。

trans-unit.source: order (integer, optional) – The order of the autoregressive process. Default is 1.
trans-unit.target: order（整数，可选）–自回归过程的顺序。默认值为1。

trans-unit.source: order (integer, optional) – The order of the model describes the dependence of the likelihood on previous regimes. This depends on the model in question and should be set appropriately by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: order（整数，可选）–模型的顺序描述了似然性对先前方案的依赖性。这取决于所讨论的模型，应该由子类适当地设置。

trans-unit.source: order (iterable) – The (p,d,q) order of the model for the number of AR parameters, differences, and MA parameters to use.
trans-unit.target: order（可迭代）–模型的（p，d，q）顺序，用于要使用的AR参数，差异和MA参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: order (iterable) – The (p,q) order of the model for the number of AR and MA parameters to use.
trans-unit.target: order（可迭代）–模型的（p，q）顺序，用于要使用的AR和MA参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: order (iterable) – The (p,q) order of the model for the number of AR parameters, differences, and MA parameters to use.
trans-unit.target: order（可迭代）–模型的（p，q）顺序，用于要使用的AR参数，差异和MA参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: order (iterable or iterable of iterables, optional) – The (p,d,q) order of the model for the number of AR parameters, differences, and MA parameters. d must be an integer indicating the integration order of the process, while p and q may either be an integers indicating the AR and MA orders (so that all lags up to those orders are included) or else iterables giving specific AR and / or MA lags to include. Default is an AR(1) model: (1,0,0).
trans-unit.target: order（可迭代的iterable 或iterable ，可选）– AR参数，差异和MA参数的数量的模型的（p，d，q）顺序。 d 必须是表示流程的集成顺序的整数，而 p 和 q 可以是表示AR和MA顺序的整数（以便包括所有滞后于这些顺序的整数），或者是可迭代的给出特定的AR和/或MA滞后包括在内。默认值为AR（1）模型：（1,0,0）。

trans-unit.source: original (str {'ex','sep','in'}) –
trans-unit.target: 原始（str {'ex' ，'sep' ，'in'}）–

trans-unit.source: orth (bool, default False) – Compute orthoganalized impulse response error bands
trans-unit.target: orth（bool ，默认为False）–计算正交脉冲响应误差带

trans-unit.source: orth (bool, default False) – Compute orthogonalized impulse responses
trans-unit.target: orth（bool ，默认为False）–计算正交的脉冲响应

trans-unit.source: orth (boolean) –
trans-unit.target: orth（布尔值）–

trans-unit.source: orthogonalized (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to perform impulse using orthogonalized innovations. Note that this will also affect custum impulse vectors. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: 正交化（布尔值，可选）–是否使用正交化创新执行脉冲。请注意，这也会影响custum impulse 向量。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: other (ProbPlot instance, array-like, or None, optional) – If provided, the sample quantiles of this ProbPlot instance are plotted against the sample quantiles of the otherProbPlot instance. If an array-like object is provided, it will be turned into a ProbPlot instance using default parameters. If not provided (default), the theoretical quantiles are used.
trans-unit.target: 其他（ ProbPlot 实例，类似数组，或无，可选）–如果提供，则将该 ProbPlot 实例的样本分位数与 other ProbPlot 实例的样本分位数作图。如果提供了类似数组的对象，则将使用默认参数将其转换为 ProbPlot 实例。如果未提供（默认），则使用理论分位数。

trans-unit.source: other (array-like, optional) – Can be used when r_matrix is specified.
trans-unit.target: 其他（类似数组，可选）–指定r_matrix时可以使用。

trans-unit.source: other (array_like or instance of DescrStatsW) – If array_like then this creates an instance of DescrStatsW with the given weights.
trans-unit.target: 其他（array_like 或DescrStatsW的实例）–如果array_like则使用给定的权重创建DescrStatsW的实例。

trans-unit.source: out
trans-unit.target: out

trans-unit.source: out – The returned array is two-dimensional if return_sorted is True, and one dimensional if return_sorted is False. If return_sorted is True, then a numpy array with two columns. The first column contains the sorted x (exog) values and the second column the associated estimated y (endog) values. If return_sorted is False, then only the fitted values are returned, and the observations will be in the same order as the input arrays.
trans-unit.target: out –如果return_sorted为True，则返回二维数组，如果return_sorted为False，则返回一维数组。如果return_sorted为True，则为具有两列的numpy数组。第一列包含已排序的x（exog）值，第二列包含相关的估计y（endog）值。如果return_sorted为False，则仅返回拟合值，并且观测值将与输入数组的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: outcome_fit_kwargs (dict-like) – Keyword arguments to use when fitting the outcome model.
trans-unit.target: result_fit_kwargs（dict-like）–拟合结果模型时使用的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: outcome_model (statsmodels model) – Regression model for the outcome. Predictor variables include the treatment/exposure, the mediator, and any other variables of interest.
trans-unit.target: result_model（statsmodels模型）–结果的回归模型。预测变量包括治疗/暴露，介体和其他任何感兴趣的变量。

trans-unit.source: outlier (bool) – Whether or not outliers are tested for and corrected, if detected.
trans-unit.target: 离群值（bool）–是否检测到并校正了离群值（如果检测到）。

trans-unit.source: output – An array with (test_statistic, pvalue) for each endogenous variable and each lag. The array is then sized (k_endog, 2, lags). If the method is called as ljungbox = res.test_serial_correlation(), then ljungbox[i] holds the results of the Ljung-Box test (as would be returned by statsmodels.stats.diagnostic.acorr_ljungbox) for the i th endogenous variable.
trans-unit.target: 输出 – 每个内生变量和每个滞后具有 (test_statistic, pvalue) 的数组。然后调整数组的大小 (k_endog, 2, lags) 。如果该方法称为 ljungbox = res.test_serial_correlation() ，则 ljungbox[i] 将保存第 i 个内生变量的Ljung-Box测试结果（由 statsmodels.stats.diagnostic.acorr_ljungbox 返回）。

trans-unit.source: output – An array with (test_statistic, pvalue) for each endogenous variable. The array is then sized (k_endog, 2). If the method is called as het = res.test_heteroskedasticity(), then het[0] is an array of size 2 corresponding to the first endogenous variable, where het[0][0] is the test statistic, and het[0][1] is the p-value.
trans-unit.target: 输出 – 每个内生变量具有 (test_statistic, pvalue) 的数组。然后调整数组大小 (k_endog, 2) 。如果将方法称为 het = res.test_heteroskedasticity() ，则 het[0] 是大小为2的数组，对应于第一个内生变量，其中 het[0][0] 是测试统计量， het[0][1] 是p值。

trans-unit.source: polynomial (array_like or list) – If an iterable, interpreted as the coefficients of the polynomial from which to form the companion matrix. Polynomial coefficients are in order of increasing degree, and may be either scalars (as in an AR(p) model) or coefficient matrices (as in a VAR(p) model). If an integer, it is interpereted as the size of a companion matrix of a scalar polynomial, where the polynomial coefficients are initialized to zeros. If a matrix polynomial is passed, \(C_0\) may be set to the scalar value 1 to indicate an identity matrix (doing so will improve the speed of the companion matrix creation).
trans-unit.target: 多项式（array_like 或list）–如果是可迭代的，则解释为从中形成伴随矩阵的多项式的系数。多项式系数按递增的顺序排列，可以是标量（如在AR（p）模型中）或系数矩阵（如在VAR（p）模型中）。如果是整数，则它与标量多项式的伴随矩阵的大小相互影响，其中多项式系数被初始化为零。如果传递了矩阵多项式，则可以将\（C_0 \）设置为标量值1以指示一个单位矩阵（这样做将提高伴随矩阵创建的速度）。

trans-unit.source: polynomial (array_like or tuple, list) – Coefficients of a polynomial, in order of increasing degree. For example, polynomial=[1, -0.5] corresponds to the polynomial \(1 - 0.5x\) which has root \(2\). If it is a matrix polynomial (in which case the coefficients are coefficient matrices), a tuple or list of matrices should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 多项式（array_like 或tuple ，list）–多项式的系数，以递增的顺序排列。例如， polynomial=[1, -0.5] 对应于具有根\（2 \）的多项式\（1-0.5x \）。如果它是矩阵多项式（在这种情况下，系数是系数矩阵），则应传递元组或矩阵列表。

trans-unit.source: prop_var (False or float in (0, 1)) – If prop_var is false, then the variance of the proportion estimate is calculated based on the sample proportion. If prop_var is a float, then it is used directly.

trans-unit.source: properties (function (key) -> dict, optional) – A function that for each tile in the mosaic take the key of the tile and returns the dictionary of properties of the generated Rectangle, like color, hatch or similar. A default properties set will be provided fot the keys whose color has not been defined, and will use color variation to help visually separates the various categories. It should return None to indicate that it should use the default property for the tile. A dictionary of the properties for each key can be passed, and it will be internally converted to the correct function
trans-unit.target: properties（function（function （key ）-> dict ，optional）–一个功能，对于镶嵌图中的每个图块，请获取图块的键，然后返回生成的Rectangle属性的字典，例如颜色，阴影或类似图形。将为尚未定义颜色的键提供默认属性集，并将使用颜色变化来帮助视觉上区分各种类别。它应该返回None，以指示它应该为tile使用默认属性。可以传递每个键的属性字典，并将其在内部转换为正确的函数

trans-unit.source: randomize (bool, optional) – If True, the bandwidth estimation is to be performed by taking n_res random resamples (with replacement) of size n_sub from the full sample. If set to False (default), the estimation is performed by slicing the full sample in sub-samples of size n_sub so that all samples are used once.
trans-unit.target: randomize（bool ，optional）–如果为True，则通过从整个样本中获取 n_res 大小的 n_sub 随机重采样（带替换）来执行带宽估计。如果设置为False（默认），则通过将完整样本切成大小为 n_sub 的子样本来执行估计，以便所有样本都使用一次。

trans-unit.source: resid (array-like) – For the Breusch-Pagan test, this should be the residual of a regression. If an array is given in exog, then the residuals are calculated by the an OLS regression or resid on exog. In this case resid should contain the dependent variable. Exog can be the same as x. TODO: I dropped the exog option, should I add it back?
trans-unit.target: resid（类似数组）–对于Breusch-Pagan检验，这应该是回归的残差。如果在exog中给出了数组，则残差是通过OLS回归或exog上的残差来计算的。在这种情况下，resid应该包含因变量。Exog可以与x相同。TODO：我放弃了exog选项，应该重新添加吗？

trans-unit.source: resid (array) – The model residuals. If the model is fit using ‘mle’ then the residuals are created via the Kalman Filter. If the model is fit using ‘css’ then the residuals are obtained via scipy.signal.lfilter adjusted such that the first k_ma residuals are zero. These zero residuals are not returned.
trans-unit.target: resid（数组）–模型残差。如果使用“ mle”拟合模型，则通过卡尔曼滤波器创建残差。如果使用“ css”拟合模型，则残差将通过 scipy.signal.lfilter 进行调整，以使第一个 k_ma 残差为零。这些零残差不返回。

trans-unit.source: resid (array) – The residuals of the fitted model. endog - fittedvalues
trans-unit.target: resid（数组）–拟合模型的残差。Endog-拟合值

trans-unit.source: resid_anscombe (array) – Anscombe residuals. See statsmodels.families.family for distribution- specific Anscombe residuals. Currently, the unscaled residuals are provided. In a future version, the scaled residuals will be provided.

trans-unit.source: resid_pearson (array) – Pearson residuals. The Pearson residuals are defined as (endog - mu)/sqrt(VAR(mu)) where VAR is the distribution specific variance function. See statsmodels.families.family and statsmodels.families.varfuncs for more information.
trans-unit.target: resid_pearson（数组）–皮尔逊残差。皮尔逊残差定义为（ endog - mu ）/ sqrt（VAR（ mu ）），其中VAR是特定于分布的方差函数。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.families.family和statsmodels.families.varfuncs。

trans-unit.source: resid_working (array) – Working residuals. The working residuals are defined as resid_response/link’(mu). See statsmodels.family.links for the derivatives of the link functions. They are defined analytically.

trans-unit.source: results – all test results, dictionary keys are the number of lags. For each lag the values are a tuple, with the first element a dictionary with teststatistic, pvalues, degrees of freedom, the second element are the OLS estimation results for the restricted model, the unrestricted model and the restriction (contrast) matrix for the parameter f_test.

trans-unit.source: ret_params (bool) – If true, returns the parameter vector that maximizes the likelihood ratio at b0_vals. Also returns the weights. Default is False
trans-unit.target: ret_params（bool）–如果为true，则返回在b0_vals处使似然比最大的参数向量。还返回权重。默认为False

trans-unit.source: retall (bool) – Set to True to return list of solutions at each iteration. Available in Results object’s mle_retvals attribute.
trans-unit.target: retall（bool）–设置为True以在每次迭代时返回解决方案列表。在Results对象的mle_retvals属性中可用。

trans-unit.source: retall (bool, optional) – Set to True to return list of solutions at each iteration. Available in Results object’s mle_retvals attribute.
trans-unit.target: retall（bool ，可选）–设置为True以在每次迭代时返回解决方案列表。在Results对象的mle_retvals属性中可用。

trans-unit.source: retnew (boolean) – If False (default), then return the lag-polynomial as array. If True, then return a new instance with invertible MA-polynomial
trans-unit.target: retnew（boolean）–如果为False（默认值），则将滞后多项式作为数组返回。如果为True，则返回具有可逆MA多项式的新实例

trans-unit.source: retspec (bool) – Whether to return the created specification file. Can be useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: retspec（bool）–是否返回创建的规范文件。对调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: return_all (bool) – if False (default), then only the covariance matrix is returned. If True, then correlation matrix and standard deviation are additionally returned.
trans-unit.target: return_all（bool）–如果为False（默认值），则仅返回协方差矩阵。如果为True，则另外返回相关矩阵和标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: return_grad (bool) – Whether or not to also return the gradient
trans-unit.target: return_grad（bool）–是否还返回渐变

trans-unit.source: return_median (bool, optional) – If True (default), the estimator uses the median of all scaling factors for each sub-sample to estimate the bandwidth of the full sample. If False, the estimator uses the mean.
trans-unit.target: return_median（bool ，可选）–如果为True（默认值），则估计器使用每个子样本的所有缩放因子的中值来估计整个样本的带宽。如果为False，则估算器使用均值。

trans-unit.source: return_object (boolean) – Return values as bunch instead of as individual values.
trans-unit.target: return_object（boolean）–以一堆而不是单个值的形式返回值。

trans-unit.source: return_only_bw (bool, optional) – If True, the estimator is to use the bandwidth and not the scaling factor. This is not theoretically justified. Should be used only for experimenting.
trans-unit.target: return_only_bw（bool ，可选）–如果为True，则估计器将使用带宽而不是比例因子。这不是理论上有道理的。应该仅用于实验。

trans-unit.source: return_pandas (bool) – If True, return value is a Pandas DataFrame or Series. Otherwise returns a ndarray.
trans-unit.target: return_pandas（bool）–如果为True，则返回值为Pandas DataFrame或Series。否则返回ndarray。

trans-unit.source: return_params (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to return only the array of maximizing parameters. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: return_params（boolean ，optional）–是否仅返回最大化参数数组。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: return_raw (boolean,optional) – Whether or not to return only the raw Hamilton filter output or a full results object. Default is to return a full results object.
trans-unit.target: return_raw（boolean ，optional）–是否仅返回原始汉密尔顿过滤器输出或完整结果对象。默认为返回完整结果对象。

trans-unit.source: return_results (bool) – If True (default), then an instance of KappaResults is returned. If False, then only kappa is computed and returned.
trans-unit.target: return_results（bool）–如果为True（默认），则返回KappaResults的实例。如果为False，则仅计算并返回kappa。

trans-unit.source: return_results (bool) – for future compatibility, currently only tuple available. If True, then a results instance is returned. Otherwise, a tuple with the test outcome is returned. Set return_results=False to avoid future changes in return.
trans-unit.target: return_results（bool）–为了将来的兼容性，当前仅提供元组。如果为True，则返回结果实例。否则，将返回带有测试结果的元组。设置 return_results=False 以避免将来返回的更改。

trans-unit.source: return_sorted (bool) – If True (default), then the returned array is sorted by exog and has missing (nan or infinite) observations removed. If False, then the returned array is in the same length and the same sequence of observations as the input array.
trans-unit.target: return_sorted（bool）–如果为True（默认值），则返回的数组将按exog排序，并且删除了缺失的（nan或infinite）观测值。如果为False，则返回的数组与输入数组的长度和观察序列相同。

trans-unit.source: return_ssm (boolean,optional) – Whether or not to return only the state space output or a full results object. Default is to return a full results object.
trans-unit.target: return_ssm（boolean ，optional）–是否仅返回状态空间输出或完整结果对象。默认为返回完整结果对象。

trans-unit.source: return_std (bool) – If this is true then the standard deviation is also returned. By default only the correlation matrix is returned.
trans-unit.target: return_std（bool）–如果为true，则还返回标准偏差。默认情况下，仅返回相关矩阵。

trans-unit.source: return_weights (bool) – If True, function also returns the weights that maximize the likelihood ratio. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: return_weights（bool）–如果为True，则函数还返回使似然比最大化的权重。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: return_weights (bool) – If True, returns the weights that maximize the likelihood of mu_array. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: return_weights（bool）–如果为True，则返回使mu_array的可能性最大化的权重。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: return_weights (bool) – If True, returns the weights that maximize the likelihood of observing sig2_0. Default is False
trans-unit.target: return_weights（bool）–如果为True，则返回使观察sig2_0的可能性最大化的权重。默认为False

trans-unit.source: return_weights (bool) – If return_weights is True the funtion returns the weights of the observations under the null hypothesis. Default is False
trans-unit.target: return_weights（bool）–如果return_weights为True，则该函数将返回零假设下的观测值的权重。默认为False

trans-unit.source: return_weights (bool) – If true, returns the weights that maximize the log-likelihood at the hypothesized value
trans-unit.target: return_weights（bool）–如果为true，则返回在假设值处最大化对数似然性的权重

trans-unit.source: returnsorted (bool) – not tested, return sorted p-values instead of original sequence
trans-unit.target: returnsorted（bool）–未测试，返回排序的p值而不是原始序列

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = (1/2.)*z**2
trans-unit.target: rho – rho（z）=（1/2。）* z ** 2

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = (1/2.)*z**2 for |z| <= a
trans-unit.target: | z |的rho – rho（z）=（1/2。）* z ** 2 <=一个

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = (1/2.)*z**2 for |z| <= c
trans-unit.target: | z |的rho – rho（z）=（1/2。）* z ** 2 <= c

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = -(1 - (z/c)**2)**3 * c**2/6. for |z| <= R
trans-unit.target: rho – rho（z）=-（1-（z / c）** 2）** 3 * c ** 2/6。对于| z | <= R

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = .5*z**2 for |z| <= t
trans-unit.target: || z | rho – rho（z）= .5 * z ** 2 <= t

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = a*(1-cos(z/a)) for |z| <= a*pi
trans-unit.target: 对于| z |，rho – rho（z）= a *（1-cos（z / a））<= a * pi

trans-unit.source: rho – rho(z) = a**-2 * (1 - exp(-a*|z|)*(1 + a*|z|))
trans-unit.target: rho – rho（z）= a **-2 *（1-exp（-a * | z |）*（1 + a * | z |））

trans-unit.source: rho (float) – correlation coefficient
trans-unit.target: rho（float）–相关系数

trans-unit.target: rho（int）-自回归协方差的阶数

trans-unit.source: rhs (list/tuple of array-like) – A set of right-hand sides; each defines a matrix equation to be solved.
trans-unit.target: rhs（类似数组的列表/元组）–一组右侧；每个定义一个要求解的矩阵方程。

trans-unit.source: rmse – root mean squared error along given axis.
trans-unit.target: rmse –沿给定轴的均方根误差。

trans-unit.source: robust ({None, "hc0", "hc1", "hc2", "hc3"}) – Use heteroscedasticity-corrected coefficient covariance matrix. If robust covariance is desired, it is recommended to use hc3.
trans-unit.target: 健壮（{无，“HC0” ，“HC1” ，“HC2” ，“HC3”}） -使用异校正系数协方差矩阵。如果需要鲁棒协方差，建议使用 hc3 。

trans-unit.source: root (2d array-like) – See above
trans-unit.target: 根（类似于2d数组）–参见上文

trans-unit.source: roots (array) – The roots of the AR process are the solution to (1 - arparams[0]*z - arparams[1]*z**2 -…- arparams[p-1]*z**k_ar) = 0 Stability requires that the roots in modulus lie outside the unit circle.
trans-unit.target: roots（array）– AR进程的根是（1-arparams [0] * z-arparams [1] * z ** 2-…-arparams [p-1] * z ** k_ar）= 0稳定性要求模数的根位于单位圆之外。

trans-unit.source: roots (array) – The roots of the VAR process are the solution to (I - coefs[0]*z - coefs[1]*z**2 … - coefs[p-1]*z**k_ar) = 0. Note that the inverse roots are returned, and stability requires that the roots lie outside the unit circle.
trans-unit.target: roots（array）– VAR过程的根是（I-coefs [0] * z-coefs [1] * z ** 2…-coefs [p-1] * z ** k_ar）= 0的解注意，返回根的倒数，并且稳定性要求根位于单位圆之外。

trans-unit.source: rtol (float, optional) – The relative tolerance criterion that must be satisfied. Defaults to 0 which means rtol is not used. Convergence is attained when: \(rtol * prior + atol > abs(current - prior)\)
trans-unit.target: rtol（float ，optional）–必须满足的相对公差标准。默认值为0，表示不使用 rtol 。在以下情况下达到收敛：\（rtol *优先级+ atol> abs（当前-优先级）\）

trans-unit.source: scale_est (string or HuberScale()) – ‘mad’ or HuberScale() Indicates the estimate to use for scaling the weights in the IRLS. The default is ‘mad’ (median absolute deviation. Other options are ‘HuberScale’ for Huber’s proposal 2. Huber’s proposal 2 has optional keyword arguments d, tol, and maxiter for specifying the tuning constant, the convergence tolerance, and the maximum number of iterations. See statsmodels.robust.scale for more information.
trans-unit.target: scale_est（字符串或HuberScale （））–'mad'或HuberScale（）指示用于缩放IRLS中权重的估计。默认值为“ mad”（中值绝对偏差。对于Huber的建议2，其他选项为“ HuberScale”。Huber的建议2具有可选的关键字参数d，tol和maxiter，用于指定调整常数，收敛容限和最大数量。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.robust.scale。

trans-unit.source: seasonal_order (iterable, optional) – The (P,D,Q,s) order of the seasonal component of the model for the AR parameters, differences, MA parameters, and periodicity. d must be an integer indicating the integration order of the process, while p and q may either be an integers indicating the AR and MA orders (so that all lags up to those orders are included) or else iterables giving specific AR and / or MA lags to include. s is an integer giving the periodicity (number of periods in season), often it is 4 for quarterly data or 12 for monthly data. Default is no seasonal effect.
trans-unit.target: season_order（iterable ，optional）– AR参数，差异，MA参数和周期性的模型季节性成分的（P，D，Q，s）顺序。 d 必须是表示流程的集成顺序的整数，而 p 和 q 可以是表示AR和MA顺序的整数（以便包括所有滞后于这些顺序的整数），或者是给出特定AR和/或MA的可迭代项滞后包括在内。 s 是给出周期性（季节的周期数）的整数，对于季度数据而言通常为4，对于月度数据而言通常为12。默认为无季节性影响。

trans-unit.source: sigma2 (float) – The variance of the residuals. If the model is fit by ‘css’, sigma2 = ssr/nobs, where ssr is the sum of squared residuals. If the model is fit by ‘mle’, then sigma2 = 1/nobs * sum(v**2 / F) where v is the one-step forecast error and F is the forecast error variance. See nobs for the difference in definitions depending on the fit.
trans-unit.target: sigma2（float）–残差的方差。如果模型通过“ css”拟合，则sigma2 = ssr / nobs，其中ssr是残差平方和。如果模型通过“ mle”拟合，则sigma2 = 1 / nobs * sum（v ** 2 / F），其中v是单步预测误差，F是预测误差方差。见 nobs 在取决于适合定义的差异。

trans-unit.source: sigma2 (float) – estimate of the residual variance or determinant of Sigma_hat in the multivariate case. If islog is true, then it is assumed that sigma is already log-ed, for example logdetSigma.
trans-unit.target: sigma2（float）–在多变量情况下，估计方差或Sigma_hat的行列式。如果islog为true，则假定sigma已被记录，例如logdetSigma。

trans-unit.source: sigma (None or float) – estimate of the standard deviation of the residuals. If None, then the estimate from the regression results is used.

If sigma is a scalar, it is assumed that sigma is an n x n diagonal matrix with the given scalar, sigma as the value of each diagonal element. If sigma is an n-length vector, then sigma is assumed to be a diagonal matrix with the given sigma on the diagonal. This should be the same as WLS.

trans-unit.source: simple_differencing (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to use partially conditional maximum likelihood estimation. If True, differencing is performed prior to estimation, which discards the first \(s D + d\) initial rows but results in a smaller state-space formulation. If False, the full SARIMAX model is put in state-space form so that all datapoints can be used in estimation. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: simple_differencing（布尔值，可选）–是否使用部分条件的最大似然估计。如果为True，则在估算之前执行差分，这会丢弃前\（s D + d \）个初始行，但会导致状态空间公式更小。如果为False，则将完整的SARIMAX模型以状态空间的形式放置，以便所有数据点均可用于估计。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: simulated_obs – An (nsimulations x k_endog) array of simulated observations.
trans-unit.target: simulated_obs -安（nsimulations X k_endog）模拟观察的阵列。

trans-unit.source: simulated_obs (array) – An (nsimulations x k_endog) array of simulated observations.
trans-unit.target: simulated_obs（阵列） -安（nsimulations X k_endog）模拟观察的阵列。

trans-unit.source: simulated_states (array) – An (nsimulations x k_states) array of simulated states.
trans-unit.target: simulated_states（阵列） -安（nsimulations X k_states）模拟状态的数组。

trans-unit.source: simulation_output (int, optional) – Determines which simulation smoother output is calculated. Default is all (including state and disturbances).
trans-unit.target: Simulation_output（int ，可选）–确定要计算哪个模拟更平滑的输出。默认为全部（包括状态和干扰）。

trans-unit.source: size (float) – The range of criterion is mapped to 10**2 - size**2 in points.
trans-unit.target: size（float）– criterion 范围以点为单位映射到10 ** 2-size ** 2。

trans-unit.source: size (int or tuple of ints, optional) – Defining number of random variates (default is 1).
trans-unit.target: size（int 或int的元组，可选）–定义随机变量的数量（默认为1）。

trans-unit.source: size (tuple of int) – size is interpreted (nobs, nvars) where each row
trans-unit.target: size（int元组）–解释大小（nobs，nvars），其中每一行

trans-unit.source: size_trim_tol (float or 'auto' (default = 'auto')) – For use when trim_mode == ‘size’
trans-unit.target: size_trim_tol（float 或'auto' （默认='auto' ））–用于trim_mode =='size'

trans-unit.source: sk1 (ndarray) – The standard skewness estimator.
trans-unit.target: sk1（ndarray）–标准偏度估计量。

trans-unit.source: sk2 (ndarray) – Skewness estimator based on quartiles.
trans-unit.target: sk2（ndarray）–基于四分位数的偏度估计器。

trans-unit.source: sk3 (ndarray) – Skewness estimator based on mean-median difference, standardized by absolute deviation.
trans-unit.target: sk3（ndarray）–基于均值中位数差的偏度估计器，通过绝对偏差标准化。

trans-unit.source: sk4 (ndarray) – Skewness estimator based on mean-median difference, standardized by standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: sk4（ndarray）–基于均值中位数差的偏度估计器，通过标准差进行标准化。

trans-unit.source: skew0 (float) – Skewness value to be tested
trans-unit.target: skew0（float）–要测试的偏度值

trans-unit.source: skew (float or array) – Estimated skewness of the data
trans-unit.target: 偏斜度（float或array）–估计的数据偏斜度

trans-unit.source: skip (int or None) – number of observations to use for initial OLS, if None then skip is set equal to the number of regressors (columns in exog)
trans-unit.target: skip（int 或None）–用于初始OLS的观察数，如果None则将skip设置为等于回归数（在exog中为列）

trans-unit.source: skip_hessian (bool, optional) – If False (default), then the negative inverse hessian is calculated after the optimization. If True, then the hessian will not be calculated. However, it will be available in methods that use the hessian in the optimization (currently only with “newton”).
trans-unit.target: skip_hessian（bool ，可选）–如果为False（默认值），则在优化之后计算负的反粗麻布。如果为True，则将不计算粗麻布。但是，它将在优化中使用粗麻布的方法中可用（当前仅在使用 “newton” ）。

trans-unit.source: skip_single (boolean) – If true, then terms that consist only of a single column and, therefore, refers only to a single parameter is skipped. If false, then all terms are included.
trans-unit.target: skip_single（boolean）–如果为true，则将跳过仅由单个列组成的术语，因此仅指单个参数。如果为假，则包括所有术语。

trans-unit.source: smc (True or False) – Whether or not to apply squared multiple correlations (method=’pa’)
trans-unit.target: smc（True 或False）–是否应用平方多重相关（method ='pa'）

trans-unit.source: smooth_method (integer, optional) – Bitmask value to set the filter method to. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: smooth_method（integer ，optional）–设置过滤方法的位掩码值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: smoother (KalmanSmoother) – The model object from which to take the updated values.
trans-unit.target: smoother（KalmanSmoother）–从中获取更新值的模型对象。

trans-unit.source: smoother_output (int, optional) – Determines which Kalman smoother output calculate. Default is all (including state, disturbances, and all covariances).
trans-unit.target: smoother_output（int ，optional）–确定计算哪个卡尔曼平滑器输出。默认为全部（包括状态，干扰和所有协方差）。

trans-unit.source: smoother_output (integer, optional) – Bitmask value to set the smoother output to. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: smoother_output（整数，可选）–设置平滑输出的位掩码值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: smoothing_level (float, optional) – The alpha value of the simple exponential smoothing, if the value is set then this value will be used as the value.
trans-unit.target: smoothing_level（float ，optional）–简单指数平滑的Alpha值，如果设置了该值，则将该值用作该值。

trans-unit.source: smoothing_level (float, optional) – The smoothing_level value of the simple exponential smoothing, if the value is set then this value will be used as the value.
trans-unit.target: smoothing_level（float ，optional）–简单指数平滑的smoothing_level值，如果设置了该值，则将该值用作该值。

trans-unit.source: smoothing_seasonal (float, optional) – The gamma value of the holt winters seasonal method, if the value is set then this value will be used as the value.
trans-unit.target: smoothing_seasonal（float ，可选）–冬季冬训季节方法的伽玛值，如果设置了该值，则将该值用作该值。

trans-unit.source: smoothing_slope (float, optional) – The beta value of the holts trend method, if the value is set then this value will be used as the value.
trans-unit.target: smoothing_slope（float ，可选）– holts趋势方法的beta值，如果设置了该值，则将该值用作该值。

trans-unit.target: smry

trans-unit.source: smry – this holds the summary tables and text, which can be printed or converted to various output formats.

trans-unit.source: soln – The solutions to the matrix equations.
trans-unit.target: soln –矩阵方程的解。

trans-unit.source: solver (str or None, optional) – Solver to be used if method is ‘mle’. The default is ‘lbfgs’ (limited memory Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno). Other choices are ‘bfgs’, ‘newton’ (Newton-Raphson), ‘nm’ (Nelder-Mead), ‘cg’ - (conjugate gradient), ‘ncg’ (non-conjugate gradient), and ‘powell’.
trans-unit.target: 求解器（str 或None ，可选，可选）–如果method为'mle'，则使用求解器。默认值为“ lbfgs”（有限的内存Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno）。其他选择是“ bfgs”，“牛顿”（Newton-Raphson），“ nm”（Nelder-Mead），“ cg”-（共轭梯度），“ ncg”（非共轭梯度）和“鲍威尔”。

trans-unit.source: solver (str or None, optional) – Solver to be used. The default is ‘lbfgs’ (limited memory Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno). Other choices are ‘bfgs’, ‘newton’ (Newton-Raphson), ‘nm’ (Nelder-Mead), ‘cg’ - (conjugate gradient), ‘ncg’ (non-conjugate gradient), and ‘powell’. By default, the limited memory BFGS uses m=12 to approximate the Hessian, projected gradient tolerance of 1e-8 and factr = 1e2. You can change these by using kwargs.
trans-unit.target: 求解器（str 或None ，可选）–要使用的求解器。默认值为“ lbfgs”（有限的内存Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno）。其他选择是“ bfgs”，“牛顿”（Newton-Raphson），“ nm”（Nelder-Mead），“ cg”-（共轭梯度），“ ncg”（非共轭梯度）和“鲍威尔”。默认情况下，有限内存BFGS使用m = 12来近似Hessian投影梯度公差为1e-8，factr = 1e2。您可以使用kwargs更改它们。

trans-unit.source: sort (boolean) – If True, then the rows of the DataFrame is sorted by contribution of each factor. applies if style is either ‘display’ or ‘strings’
trans-unit.target: sort（boolean）–如果为True，则按每个因素的贡献对DataFrame的行进行排序。如果样式是“显示”或“字符串”，则适用

trans-unit.source: sorted (bool) – Default is False.
trans-unit.target: sorted（bool）–默认为False。

trans-unit.source: speconly (bool) – Whether to create the specification file and then return it without performing the analysis. Can be useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: speconly（bool）–是否创建规格文件然后不执行分析就将其返回。对调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: split (None or integer or float in intervall (0,1)) – index at which sample is split. If 0<split<1 then split is interpreted as fraction of the observations in the first sample
trans-unit.target: 分裂（无或整数或浮点数在INTERVALL （0 ，1 ）） -索引在该样品被分割。如果0 <split <1，则将split解释为第一个样本中观察值的一部分

trans-unit.source: srange (bool) – if true, then the correction is divided by 2 for the variance of the studentized range statistic
trans-unit.target: srange（bool）–如果为true，则将校正后的值除以2，得出学生化范围统计量的方差

trans-unit.source: srange (bool) – if true, then the correction is divided by the number of samples for the variance of the studentized range statistic
trans-unit.target: srange（bool）-如果为true，则将校正值除以学生数范围统计量的方差的样本数

trans-unit.source: ssli (list of tuples) – each tuple is considered as a set
trans-unit.target: ssli（元组列表）–每个元组被视为一个集合

trans-unit.source: stability_method (int, optional) – Determines which numerical stability techniques to use. Default is to enforce symmetry of the predicted state covariance matrix.
trans-unit.target: stable_method（int ，optional）–确定要使用的数值稳定性技术。默认设置是增强预测状态协方差矩阵的对称性。

trans-unit.source: stability_method (integer, optional) – Bitmask value to set the stability method to. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: stable_method（整数，可选）–将稳定性方法设置为的位掩码值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: stand_errors (array) – The standard errors of the fitted GLM. #TODO still named bse
trans-unit.target: stand_errors（数组）–装配的GLM的标准错误。#TODO仍命名为bse

trans-unit.source: standardize (bool, optional) – Flag indicating to use standardized data with mean 0 and unit variance. standardized being True implies demean. Using standardized data is equivalent to computing principal components from the correlation matrix of data
trans-unit.target: standardize（布尔值，可选）–标记，指示使用均值为0和单位方差的标准化数据。标准化为True意味着举止得体。使用标准化数据等效于根据数据的相关矩阵计算主要成分

trans-unit.source: start params: start parameters must be set, even if it is just a vector of zeros, although often good start parameters can be found from the data. Maximum likelihood estimation by gradient methods (as employed here) can be sensitive to the starting parameters, so it is important to select good ones if possible. Here it does not matter too much (although as variances, they should't be set zero).
trans-unit.target: 起始参数：尽管通常可以从数据中找到良好的起始参数，但即使仅是零向量，也必须设置起始参数。通过梯度方法（此处采用）进行的最大似然估计可能对起始参数敏感，因此，如果可能的话，选择良好的参数非常重要。此处并没有太大关系（尽管作为方差，不应将其设置为零）。

trans-unit.source: start (array-like) – Starting values, currently only used for ML estimation
trans-unit.target: start（类似数组）–起始值，当前仅用于ML估计

trans-unit.source: start (array) – starting value for parameters
trans-unit.target: start（array）–参数的起始值

trans-unit.source: start (array_like) – starting values for minimization
trans-unit.target: start（array_like）–最小化的起始值

trans-unit.source: start (int) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to start forecasting, i.e., the first forecast will be at start.
trans-unit.target: start（int）–从零索引开始的观察编号，开始进行预测，即第一个预测将在开始时进行。

trans-unit.source: start (int, optional) – Integer of the start observation. Default is 0.
trans-unit.target: start（int ，optional）–开始观测值的整数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: start (int, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to start forecasting, i.e., the first forecast will be at start.
trans-unit.target: start（int ，可选）–零索引观测值开始预测，即第一个预测将在开始时开始。

trans-unit.source: start (int, str, or datetime) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to start forecasting, ie., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type.
trans-unit.target: start（int ，str 或datetime）–从零索引开始的观察编号，开始进行预测，即，第一个预测开始。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。

trans-unit.source: start (int, str, or datetime, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to start forecasting, i.e., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. Default is the the zeroth observation.
trans-unit.target: start（int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–从零索引开始观察的观察编号，即开始第一个预测。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。默认值为第零个观察值。

trans-unit.source: start (int, str, or datetime, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to start forecasting, ie., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. Default is the the zeroth observation.
trans-unit.target: start（int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–从零索引开始观察的观察编号，即开始第一个预测。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。默认值为第零个观察值。

trans-unit.source: start (not used) – starting values for minimization, not used, only for consistency of method signature
trans-unit.target: start（未使用）–最小化的起始值，未使用，仅用于方法签名的一致性

trans-unit.source: start (str, datetime) – Must be given if endog does not have date information in its index. Anything accepted by pandas.DatetimeIndex for the start value.
trans-unit.target: start（str ，datetime）–如果 endog 中没有日期信息，则必须给出。pandas.DatetimeIndex接受的任何初始值。

trans-unit.source: start_ar_lags (int, optional) – Parameter for fitting start_params. When fitting start_params, residuals are obtained from an AR fit, then an ARMA(p,q) model is fit via OLS using these residuals. If start_ar_lags is None, fit an AR process according to best BIC. If start_ar_lags is not None, fits an AR process with a lag length equal to start_ar_lags. See ARMA._fit_start_params_hr for more information.
trans-unit.target: start_ar_lags（int ，optional）–用于拟合start_params的参数。拟合start_params时，会从AR拟合中获得残差，然后使用这些残差通过OLS拟合ARMA（p，q）模型。如果start_ar_lags为“无”，则根据最佳BIC设置AR进程。如果start_ar_lags不为None，则适合滞后时间等于start_ar_lags的AR进程。有关更多信息，请参见ARMA._fit_start_params_hr。

trans-unit.source: start_params (None or array_like) – starting values for the optimization. start_params needs to be given in the original parameter space and are internally transformed.
trans-unit.target: start_params（无或array_like）–优化的起始值。需要在原始参数空间中指定 start_params 并对其进行内部转换。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like) – A vector of starting values for the regression coefficients. If None, a default is chosen.
trans-unit.target: start_params（类似数组）–回归系数的起始值的向量。如果为None，则选择默认值。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like) – Starting values for params.
trans-unit.target: start_params（类似数组）– params 的起始值。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like or MixedLMParams) – Starting values for the profile log-likelihood. If not a MixedLMParams instance, this should be an array containing the packed parameters for the profile log-likelihood, including the fixed effects parameters.
trans-unit.target: start_params（类似数组或MixedLMParams）–概要文件对数可能性的起始值。如果不是 MixedLMParams 实例，则它应该是一个数组，其中包含配置文件对数可能性的打包参数，包括固定效果参数。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like, optional) – A first guess on the parameters. Default is cmle estimates.
trans-unit.target: start_params（类似数组，可选）–对参数的首次猜测。默认值为cmle估算值。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like, optional) – Initial guess of the solution for the loglikelihood maximization. The default is an array of zeros.
trans-unit.target: start_params（array-like ，optional）–对数似然最大化的解决方案的初始猜测。默认值为零数组。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like, optional) – Initial guess of the solution for the loglikelihood maximization. The default is family-specific and is given by the family.starting_mu(endog). If start_params is given then the initial mean will be calculated as np.dot(exog, start_params).
trans-unit.target: start_params（array-like ，optional）–对数似然最大化的解决方案的初始猜测。默认值是特定于家庭的，由 family.starting_mu(endog) 给出。如果给定了start_params，则初始均值将被计算为 np.dot(exog, start_params) 。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array-like, optional) – Starting parameters for ARMA(p,q). If None, the default is given by ARMA._fit_start_params. See there for more information.
trans-unit.target: start_params（array-like ，optional）– ARMA（p，q）的启动参数。如果为None，则默认值由ARMA._fit_start_params给出。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array (optional)) – starting value for parameters ub minimization. If None then fitstart method is called for the starting values.
trans-unit.target: start_params（数组（可选））–参数ub最小化的起始值。如果为None，则调用fitstart方法作为起始值。

trans-unit.source: start_params (array_like, optional) – Initial guess of the solution for the loglikelihood maximization. If None, the default is given by Model.start_params.
trans-unit.target: start_params（array_like ，optional）–对数似然最大化的解决方案的初始猜测。如果为None，则默认值由Model.start_params给出。

trans-unit.source: start_weights (array (nmoms, nmoms)) – initial weighting matrix; if None, then the identity matrix is used
trans-unit.target: start_weights（array （nmoms ，nmoms ））–初始加权矩阵；如果为None，则使用单位矩阵

trans-unit.source: stat (float or int, array) – The test statistic is the chisquare statistic if exact is false. If the exact binomial distribution is used, then this contains the min(n1, n2), where n1, n2 are cases that are zero in one sample but one in the other sample.
trans-unit.target: stat（float或int，array）–如果确切为false，则测试统计量为卡方统计量。如果使用精确的二项式分布，则它包含min（n1，n2），其中n1，n2是在一个样本中为零而在另一个样本中为零的情况。

trans-unit.source: stat (float) – test statistic
trans-unit.target: stat（float）–测试统计

trans-unit.source: stat (ndarray) – test statistic
trans-unit.target: stat（ndarray）–测试统计

trans-unit.source: state_cov (array_like, optional) – The covariance matrix for the state equation \(Q\). Default is set to zeros.
trans-unit.target: state_cov（array_like ，optional）–状态方程\（Q \）的协方差矩阵。默认设置为零。

trans-unit.source: state_intercept (array_like, optional) – The intercept for the transition equation, \(c\). Default is set to zeros.
trans-unit.target: state_intercept（array_like ，可选）–转换方程\（c \）的截距。默认设置为零。

trans-unit.source: state_shocks (array_like, optional) – If specified, these are the shocks to the state equation, \(\eta_t\). If unspecified, these are automatically generated using a pseudo-random number generator. If specified, must be shaped nsimulations x k_posdef where k_posdef is the same as in the state space model.
trans-unit.target: state_shocks（array_like ，optional）–如果指定，这些是对状态方程\（\ eta_t \）的冲击。如果未指定，则使用伪随机数生成器自动生成这些。如果指定，则必须对 nsimulations x k_posdef 进行整形，其中 k_posdef 与状态空间模型中的相同。

trans-unit.source: statespace matrices: by default, all state space matrices (obs_intercept, design, obs_cov, state_intercept, transition, selection, state_cov) are set to zeros. Values that are fixed (like the ones in the design and transition matrices here) can be set in initialization, whereas values that vary with the parameters should be set in the update method. Note that it is easy to forget to set the selection matrix, which is often just the identity matrix (as it is here), but not setting it will lead to a very different model (one where there is not a stochastic component to the transition equation).
trans-unit.target: 状态空间矩阵：默认情况下，所有状态空间矩阵（ obs_intercept, design, obs_cov, state_intercept, transition, selection, state_cov ）均设置为零。可以在初始化中设置固定的值（例如此处的设计矩阵和过渡矩阵中的值），而随参数而变化的值应在 update 方法中设置。请注意，很容易忘记设置选择矩阵，该矩阵通常只是单位矩阵（如此处所示），但是如果不设置它，则会导致模型非常不同（一个没有随机成分的过渡模型）方程）。

trans-unit.source: statistic (bool, optional (default False)) – if true will use a crude statistical model to give colors to the plot. If the tile has a containt that is more than 2 standard deviation from the expected value under independence hipotesys, it will go from green to red (for positive deviations, blue otherwise) and will acquire an hatching when crosses the 3 sigma.
trans-unit.target: statistic（bool ，可选（默认为False ））–如果为true，则将使用粗略的统计模型为绘图提供颜色。如果磁贴的约束与hiphop独立系统下的期望值相差超过2个标准偏差，则它将从绿色变为红色（对于正偏差，否则为蓝色），并且在超过3 sigma时将获得阴影。

trans-unit.source: statistic (float or int, array) – The test statistic is the chisquare statistic if exact is false. If the exact binomial distribution is used, then this contains the min(n1, n2), where n1, n2 are cases that are zero in one sample but one in the other sample.
trans-unit.target: statistic（float或int，array）–如果确切为false，则测试统计量为卡方统计量。如果使用精确的二项式分布，则它包含min（n1，n2），其中n1，n2是在一个样本中为零而在另一个样本中为零的情况。

trans-unit.source: status (array-like) – Status at the event time, status==1 is the ‘event’ (e.g. death, failure), meaning that the event occurs at the given value in time; status==0 indicates that censoring has occured, meaning that the event occurs after the given value in time.
trans-unit.target: 状态（类似数组）–事件发生时的状态，状态== 1是“事件”（例如死亡，失败），表示事件以给定的 time 值发生；status == 0表示已进行检查，这意味着事件在 time 的给定值之后发生。

trans-unit.source: status (array-like) – The censoring status values; status=1 indicates that an event occured (e.g. failure or death), status=0 indicates that the observation was right censored. If None, defaults to status=1 for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 状态（类似数组）–审查状态值；status = 1表示发生了某个事件（例如失败或死亡），status = 0表示对观察结果进行了正确审查。如果为None，则在所有情况下均默认为status = 1。

trans-unit.source: stderr_beta (ndarray (neqs x coint_rank)) – The standard errors of \(\beta\).

trans-unit.target: stderr_coint（ndarray（neqs + num_det_coef_coint x coint_rank ））–包含标准误差\（\ beta \）和与协整关系内部的确定性项有关的估计参数的数组。

trans-unit.target: stderr_det_coef（ndarray（协整关系外的neqs x det。项））–估计与协整关系外的确定性项有关的参数的标准误差。

trans-unit.target: stderr_det_coef_coint（ndarray（num_det_coef_coint x coint_rank ））–估计与协整关系内的确定项有关的参数的标准误差。

trans-unit.source: steps (int) – Prediction horizon.

trans-unit.source: steps (int, optional) – The number of steps for which impulse responses are calculated. Default is 1. Note that the initial impulse is not counted as a step, so if steps=1, the output will have 2 entries.
trans-unit.target: 步数（int ，可选）–计算脉冲响应的步数。默认值为1。请注意，初始脉冲不计为一步，因此，如果 steps=1 ，则输出将有2个条目。

trans-unit.source: steps (int, optional) – The number of steps for which impulse responses are calculated. Default is 10. Note that the initial impulse is not counted as a step, so if steps=1, the output will have 2 entries.
trans-unit.target: 步数（int ，可选）–计算脉冲响应的步数。默认值为10。请注意，初始脉冲不计为一步，因此，如果 steps=1 ，则输出将有2个条目。

trans-unit.source: steps (int, str, or datetime, optional) – If an integer, the number of steps to forecast from the end of the sample. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. However, if the dates index does not have a fixed frequency, steps must be an integer. Default
trans-unit.target: 步骤（int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–如果为整数，则为从样本末尾开始预测的步骤数。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。但是，如果日期索引没有固定的频率，则步长必须为整数。默认

trans-unit.source: stochastic_cycle (bool, optional) – Whether or not any cycle component is stochastic. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: stochastic_cycle（bool ，可选）–是否有任何周期分量是随机的。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: stochastic_exog (bool) – When TRUE, the exogenous variables are assumed to be stochastic. When the regressors are nonstochastic, moment conditions are placed on the exogenous variables. Confidence intervals for stochastic regressors are at least as large as non-stochastic regressors. Default = TRUE
trans-unit.target: stochastic_exog（bool）–为TRUE时，假定外生变量为随机变量。当回归变量是非随机的时，矩条件被置于外生变量上。随机回归变量的置信区间至少与非随机回归变量的置信区间一样大。默认值= TRUE

trans-unit.source: stochastic_freq_seasonal (list of bools, optional) – Whether or not each seasonal component(s) is (are) stochastic. Default is True for each component. The list should be of the same length as freq_seasonal.
trans-unit.target: stochastic_freq_seasonal（布尔值列表，可选）–每个季节成分是否都是随机的。每个组件的默认值为True。该列表的长度应与freq_seasonal相同。

trans-unit.source: stochastic_level (bool, optional) – Whether or not any level component is stochastic. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: stochastic_level（bool ，可选）–是否有任何关卡组件是随机的。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: stochastic_seasonal (bool, optional) – Whether or not any seasonal component is stochastic. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: stochastic_seasonal（bool ，可选）–是否有任何季节性成分是随机的。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: stochastic_trend (bool, optional) – Whether or not any trend component is stochastic. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: stochastic_trend（bool ，可选）–是否有任何趋势成分是随机的。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: store (bool) – If True, then a result instance is returned additionally to the KPSS statistic (default is False).
trans-unit.target: store（bool）–如果为True，则另外将结果实例返回到KPSS统计信息（默认为False）。

trans-unit.source: store (bool) – If True, then a result instance is returned additionally to the adf statistic. Default is False
trans-unit.target: store（bool）–如果为True，则将结果实例另外返回给adf统计信息。默认为False

trans-unit.source: store (bool) – If store is true, then an additional class instance that contains intermediate results is returned.
trans-unit.target: store（bool）–如果store为true，则返回另一个包含中间结果的类实例。

trans-unit.source: store (bool) – If true then the intermediate results are also returned
trans-unit.target: store（bool）–如果为true，则还返回中间结果

trans-unit.source: store (bool) – If true, then parameter estimates for all bootstrap iterations are attached in self.bootstrap_results
trans-unit.target: store（bool）–如果为true，则所有引导程序迭代的参数估计值都附加在self.bootstrap_results中

trans-unit.source: strata (array-like) – A vector of stratum values used to form the predictions. Not used (may be ‘None’) if pred_type is ‘lhr’ or ‘hr’. If exog is None, the model stratum values are used. If exog is not None and pred_type is ‘surv’ or ‘cumhaz’, stratum values must be provided (unless there is only one stratum).
trans-unit.target: 地层（类似数组）–用来形成预测的地层值向量。如果pred_type为'lhr'或'hr'，则不使用（可能为“ None”）。如果 exog 为None，则使用模型层值。如果 exog 不为None并且pred_type为'surv'或'cumhaz'，则必须提供层值（除非只有一个层）。

trans-unit.source: strata (array-like) – Stratum labels. If None, all observations are taken to be in a single stratum.
trans-unit.target: 地层（类似阵列）–地层标签。如果为“无”，则将所有观测值视为在单个层次中。

trans-unit.source: strata (int or string) – The column index or name of data specifying the variable defining the strata.
trans-unit.target: strata（整数或字符串）–列索引或 data 名称，用于指定定义层次的变量。

trans-unit.target: 子集（类似数组）–布尔，整数或索引值的类似数组的对象，它们指示要在模型中使用的df的子集。假设df是 pandas.DataFrame

trans-unit.source: summary – A summary containing information about estimated parameters.
trans-unit.target: summary –摘要，其中包含有关估计参数的信息。

trans-unit.source: summary – This holds the summary table and text, which can be printed or converted to various output formats.
trans-unit.target: 摘要 –包含摘要表和文本，可以将其打印或转换为各种输出格式。

trans-unit.source: sumtab (SimpleTable instance) – summary table for printing
trans-unit.target: sumtab（SimpleTable实例）–用于打印的摘要表

trans-unit.source: sup_b (float) – test statistic, maximum of absolute value of scaled cumulative OLS residuals
trans-unit.target: sup_b（float）–测试统计量，缩放的累积OLS残差的绝对值的最大值

trans-unit.source: switching_ar (boolean or iterable, optional) – If a boolean, sets whether or not all autoregressive coefficients are switching across regimes. If an iterable, should be of length equal to order, where each element is a boolean describing whether the corresponding coefficient is switching. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: switching_ar（布尔值或iterable ，可选）–如果为布尔值，则设置是否所有自回归系数都在不同状态之间进行切换。如果是可迭代的，则其长度应等于 order ，其中每个元素都是一个布尔值，描述相应的系数是否在切换。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: switching_exog (boolean or iterable, optional) – If a boolean, sets whether or not all regression coefficients are switching across regimes. If an iterable, should be of length equal to the number of exogenous variables, where each element is a boolean describing whether the corresponding coefficient is switching. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: switching_exog（布尔值或iterable ，可选）–如果为布尔值，则设置是否所有回归系数都在各个方案之间进行切换。如果是可迭代的，则其长度应等于外生变量的数量，其中每个元素都是一个布尔值，描述相应的系数是否在切换。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: switching_trend (boolean or iterable, optional) – If a boolean, sets whether or not all trend coefficients are switching across regimes. If an iterable, should be of length equal to the number of trend variables, where each element is a boolean describing whether the corresponding coefficient is switching. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: switching_trend（布尔或迭代，可选） -如果一个布尔值，设置是否所有的趋势系数是跨区域的切换。如果是可迭代的，则其长度应等于趋势变量的数量，其中每个元素都是一个布尔值，描述相应的系数是否在切换。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: switching_variance (boolean, optional) – Whether or not there is regime-specific heteroskedasticity, i.e. whether or not the error term has a switching variance. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: switching_variance（布尔值，可选） -无论是否有政权特异性异，即，误差项是否具有开关方差。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: sys (list) – [endog1, exog1, endog2, exog2,…] It will be of length 2 x M, where M is the number of equations endog = exog.
trans-unit.target: sys（list）– [endog1，exog1，endog2，exog2，…]它的长度为2 x M，其中M是endog = exog的方程数。

trans-unit.target: t2，pv2（元组）–上阈值测试的测试统计量和p值

trans-unit.source: t (float, optional) – The tuning constant for Huber’s t function. The default value is 1.345.
trans-unit.target: t（float ，可选）– Huber的t函数的调整常数。默认值为1.345。

trans-unit.source: table – Returns either an ndarray or a DataFrame if labels is not None. Will attempt to get labels from model_results if available. The columns are the Studentized residuals, the unadjusted p-value, and the corrected p-value according to method.
trans-unit.target: table –如果标签不是None，则返回ndarray或DataFrame。尝试从model_results获取标签（如果有）。列是学生化残差，未调整的p值和根据方法校正的p值。
